body_html: I've had this issue a couple of times as well. I added a function to a small repo of GPU utilities that I have to kill processes that are using GPUs as shown by lsof /dev/nvidia* but which aren't listed by nvidia-smi. Take a look here if you're interested.
body_text: I've had this issue a couple of times as well. I added a function to a small repo of GPU utilities that I have to kill processes that are using GPUs as shown by lsof /dev/nvidia* but which aren't listed by nvidia-smi. Take a look here if you're interested.
body: I've had this issue a couple of times as well. I added a function to a small repo of GPU utilities that I have to kill processes that are using GPUs as shown by `lsof /dev/nvidia*` but which aren't listed by `nvidia-smi`. Take a look [here](https://github.com/neighthan/gpu-utils/blob/c6329f21fa3780ee89985b7974194cb808643f5c/gpu_utils/utils.py#L114) if you're interested.
